mdRecord.dcterms:title: Old Fire Place in the Family Kitchen
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnson, N. G. (Newton G.)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the fireplace and dining tables in the Kitchen at Mount Vernon. Mounted on orange board. The photographer's imprint on the front of the card reads, N. G. Johnson, Photographer, 317 Pennsylvania Avenue, Washington D. C. Only Authorized Publisher of Mt. Vernon Views. A preprinted label affixed to the reverse reads, Old Fire Place in the Family Kitchen, Showing the old Crane, and low, Dutch range, etc., which shows that the demands upon the cook were not limited in Washington's time. Copyright of the Mount Vernon Association.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Kitchen
